info: You can get your free test from when you are 45...
And you can still get screened even if you feel healthy!
Screening mammograms can be done at BreastScreen clinics across the country, with mobile units coming through smaller towns throughout the year!
...and wahine between 45-69 who've never been screened
You can get your free test from when you are 60...
And you can still get screened even if you feel healthy!

You will receive your FREE bowel screening test kit every 2 years in the mail. The test is quick, easy, clean and can be done at home! 
If you are aged between 60-74 years and have not received a test kit,
Who can get screened for bowel cancer content
Additional contact and follow up is provided to:
Māori and Pacific who have not completed a test
You can get your free test from when you are 25...
Follow-up testing is free for everyone, regardless of their eligibility for free routine screening
You can visit your usual doctor or nurse at GP clinic, or a Māori, Pacific or women’s community health center!
Extra support available for wahine and people:
..and wahine between 30-69 who've never been screened
